CustomField.description: (MP Budget - MP Allocated Budget) if Record Type equals "Campaigns Prohibited - Editable" or "Campaigns Prohibited - Not Edible".
CustomField.formula: IF((CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "Campaigns Prohibited - Editable")),(Budget__c - AllocatedBudget__c), IF((CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "Campaigns Prohibited - Not Editable")),(Budget__c - AllocatedBudget__c), null))
CustomField.label: MP Unallocated Budget
